## Protocol.Debugger.SetBreakpointByUrlRequest.condition property

Expression to use as a breakpoint condition. When specified, debugger will only stop on the breakpoint if this expression evaluates to true.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
condition?: string;
```
